titleStmt.title: A letter out of Ireland from an eminent divine of the Church of England giving a full and true account of the sickness, death and funeral of the late Bishop of Chester.
titleStmt.author: Hewetson, Michael, 1643-1724.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
